q1.question: What is a memory capsule?
q1.answer: A memory capsule is a secure digital container that preserves your memories as texts, photos, videos and audio. It's your personal story, organized chronologically and ready to be passed on to future generations. Each capsule is private and accessible only to people you authorize.

q2.question: Is my data secure?
q2.answer: Absolutely. Your data is encrypted with the highest standards (AES-256), backed up daily on secure servers, and you maintain full control over who can access it. Our commitment: your memories remain private.

q3.question: How does family sharing work?
q3.answer: You can create circles of trust (family, friends) and invite members by email. For each circle, you define permissions: read only, comments, or contribution. Members can add their own perspectives on your shared memories.

q4.question: What happens to my data if I don't renew?
q4.answer: Your data is never automatically deleted. If you switch from Premium to Free, you keep read access to all your content. Only advanced features are disabled. You can always export your data at any time.

q5.question: How does the posthumous legacy work?
q5.answer: With the Legacy offer, you designate trusted contacts who will be notified and receive access to certain capsules according to your wishes. You can schedule delayed revelations, define access conditions, and leave personal messages.

q6.question: Is there a mobile app?
q6.answer: The web platform is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile. A native iOS and Android app is planned in our roadmap to enable direct recording and offline mode.
